name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
[A woman posted a photo of her unit director sending her sexy underwear as a gift. Official response: Relevant departments are involved in the investigation]
On August 20, a Weibo user posted a Weibo saying: "Thank you for the gift from Deputy Director Gao. I will work hard to serve the people." The picture is a sexy underwear;
On August 21, the user posted another Weibo saying; "Section Chief Jing knew that I was in a bad mood and sent me a super nice banana as a gift for the Chinese Valentine's Day." The relevant Weibo content posted by the user triggered netizens' speculation about her real work identity and whether there was a power-for-sex transaction behind it.
In response to this matter, the reporter called the reporting hotline of the Jiangsu Provincial Discipline Inspection and Supervision Agency. The operator recorded the relevant situation and told the reporter that because the identity information and work unit of the relevant Weibo user could not be verified, it could not be accepted for the time being. If the relevant content posted by the user can prove his work unit later, he can report the matter to the discipline inspection department again. According to the staff of the Jiangsu Provincial Internet Illegal and Harmful Information Reporting Center, they have paid attention to the relevant situation on the Internet and relevant departments have intervened in the investigation and handling.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
In fact, in my opinion, the official media's large-scale spread of the horror of nuclear pollution has certain benefits, that is, it has once again increased the sensitivity of the Chinese people to environmental issues.
The video shows the Lianyungang nuclear waste protest on August 9, 2016.
The local intention to build a nuclear waste treatment plant led to citizens taking to the streets to protest against nuclear demonstrations.
On the 10th, under the protest of citizens, the Lianyungang Municipal Government suspended the project.
I think that in the future, China will have a hard time in the construction of similar nuclear projects because of the official media's influence on the horror propaganda of Japan's nuclear waste.
